newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Dutch central bank leaves advances rate unchanged.
newsitem.headline: Dutch central bank leaves advances rate unchanged.

text.p: The Dutch central bank said on Thursday it left its special advances rate unchanged at 2.50 percent for a seven-day money market pact it will launch at tender on Friday.
Subscriptions to the new special advances pact will be open between 0730 and 0800 GMT on Friday and allocations will be announced shortly afterwards.
The new liquidity pact will replace a seven-day facility of 2.97 billion guilders expiring on Friday.
